overview: Joseph is the Chief Scientist for 77 Pieces. He is an Associate Professor in the Dept. of Mathematics at UCLA. On October 14th, 2011 Joseph received a PECASE award from President Obama at the White House, the highest honor a US scientist can receive in the early stages of their career. Joseph is a world-renowned authority on finite element analysis, fluid dynamics and virtual surgery, he has been called â€œOne of the 50 Best Brains in Scienceâ€ by Discovery Magazine and also made their list of the â€œTop 20 Scientists under 40â€²â€².
